Package alix.util

Class DicVek

  • java.lang.Object
    • alix.util.DicVek
  • public class DicVek
extends java.lang.Object
    A data structure for sparse matrix of terms, optimized for cosine similarity. Each chain is mapped to an int code by an internal dictionary. For each head code is stored a vector of values, corresponding Space of a corpus, dictionary with vectors of co-occurrences. TermList are stores as int, for efficency and Cosine calculations. There are probably lots of better optimizations, similarities are for now linear calculations. TODO test memory size TODO for cosine distance, evaluate perfs of an array of arrays (instead of int HashMap) TODO, try other proximity relevance https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MinHash https://github.com/tdebatty/java-LSH super-bit locality ? Started from code of Marianne Reboul. Idea from Google word2vek
    Author:
    glorieux-f
